mapper.sql: id, name, info, duty, characters, master_name, master_tel, lead_organize, registration_time, registration_name, num, general_rules, purpose, droit, obligation, requirement, other, profession_id, create_time, update_time, status
mapper.select: select aa.*, cc.name as professionName from res_department aa LEFT JOIN res_profession cc ON cc.id = aa.profession_id where aa.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into res_department (name, info, duty, characters, master_name, master_tel, lead_organize, registration_time, registration_name, num, general_rules, purpose, droit, obligation, requirement, other, profession_id, create_time, update_time, status) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{characters,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{masterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{masterTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leadOrganize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{generalRules,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{droit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obligation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{professionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update res_department
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
characters = #{characters,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
master_name = #{masterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

lead_organize = #{leadOrganize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

registration_name = #{registrationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update res_department set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, characters = #{characters,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, master_name = #{masterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, master_tel = #{masterTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lead_organize = #{leadOrganize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registration_time = #{registrationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registration_name = #{registrationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, general_rules = #{generalRules,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, droit = #{droit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, obligation = #{obligation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, requirement = #{requirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profession_id = #{professionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select aa.*, cc.name as professionName from res_department aa LEFT JOIN res_profession cc ON cc.id = aa.profession_id
and aa.id = #{id}
and aa.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and aa.info LIKE CONCAT('%',#{info},'%')
and aa.duty LIKE CONCAT('%',#{duty},'%')
and aa.characters LIKE CONCAT('%',#{characters},'%')
and aa.master_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{masterName},'%')
and aa.master_tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{masterTel},'%')
and aa.lead_organize LIKE CONCAT('%',#{leadOrganize},'%')
and aa.registration_time = #{registrationTime}
and aa.registration_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{registrationName},'%')
and aa.num = #{num}
and aa.general_rules LIKE CONCAT('%',#{generalRules},'%')
and aa.purpose LIKE CONCAT('%',#{purpose},'%')
and aa.droit LIKE CONCAT('%',#{droit},'%')
and aa.obligation LIKE CONCAT('%',#{obligation},'%')
and aa.requirement LIKE CONCAT('%',#{requirement},'%')
and aa.other LIKE CONCAT('%',#{other},'%')
and aa.profession_id = #{professionId}
and aa.create_time = #{createTime}
and aa.update_time = #{updateTime}
and aa.status = #{status}
and aa.status = 'ENABLED'
and cc.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{professionName},'%')
order by update_time desc
